title: Get rid of ContenSource's workaround for closing b/gzip input stream once this is fixed in CommonCompress
description: Once COMPRESS-127 is fixed get rid of the entire workaround method ContentSource.closableCompressorInputStream(). It would simplify the code and would perform better without that delegation.

comments.content:
COMPRESS-127 was fixed, so whenever a new CommonsCompress release is available should be able to complete this one.
I subscribed to announce@apache.org to be notified when that happens...
comments.author: Doron Cohen
